website_summaries.verdict: This CoQ10 heart supplement boasts a cardiologist recommended formulation that puts similar products in the shade.
pros: Both fat and water soluble for superior absorption and enhanced efficacy
Combats CoQ10 loss caused by aging and cholesterol-lowering medications
Improves heart health, helps to maintain optimal blood pressure levels, and boosts energy
Delivers a full daily dose in a single soft-gel capsule
cons: Some users feel they’re too large to swallow comfortably

customer_reviews.title: As someone with MVP (mitral valve prolapse)
customer_reviews.text: I was diagnosed with mitral valve prolapse 5 years ago. And no matter how healthy I've tried to be (quitting some trigger food and drinks, eating plenty of greens, exercising consistently), I've always experienced some of the unpleasant symptoms: chest pains, palpitations, and the anxiety that stems from these. HOWEVER. After some time of taking CoQ10, I have not had all the unpleasantness happen again. I FEEL BETTER. This has never happened before with a supplement, there is always some degree of uncertainty as to whether they would actually make any difference. I hope this helps you as much as it seems to help me. And of course, always keep consulting your cardiologist regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Diego Lugo

customer_reviews.title: Because Amazon will not let me return this so my money has been wasted
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to the Texas sun and heat only half Of the bottle could be kept
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN WATTS

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT - Not only lowers your cholesterol level but stops muscle cramps.
customer_reviews.text: Took it for only 2 months and it had lowered my cholesterol by 20 pts. Also, I suffered from debilitating muscle cramps due to some bipolar meds I have to take - my cramps are COMPLETELY gone. I also understand from talking to others who take statin drugs that they have muscle problems and this brand of CoQ10 has pretty much eliminated them.
customer_reviews.author: michelle patterson

customer_reviews.title: Please consult your doctor before taking
customer_reviews.text: Consult your doctor before taking this. Recommended to me by several people. But after 5 days, I had shortness of breath, my heart raced and couldn't walk 10 feet before I had to stop and take a rest. Going up and down stairs was equally hard as I live on the 3rd floor. Very scary! Stopped after 5th day and was back to normal within 2 weeks. I thought it was just me but later found out that another friend of mine had the same experience.
customer_reviews.author: K T

customer_reviews.title: effective product
customer_reviews.text: I had pain in my heart. I noticed I had a great improvement after two weeks of taking it everyday. When something works, we need to tell others about our experience. It is really a wonderful product

customer_reviews.title: Sorbitol
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy if you can't handle sorbitol, it bloated me so bad and they won't let you return it

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product.... it brought my blood pressure down to normal. Works better than the BP meds I was taking. Took about 6-weeks to notice the change.
customer_reviews.author: Jan R

customer_reviews.title: do not buy in summer
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my mother and unfortunately both bottles had been exposed to excessive heat. They were hand delivered to her and put into an air conditioned house. Can't even dig them out with your finger. Unfortunately she didn't know to check (and shouldn't had to). Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: A must  have
customer_reviews.text: I started using this every day and found my energy levels rise I was feeling so good I decided to take this every other day then stopped completely my energy left me I have learned my lesson and am taking this every day it took two days to return to my previous energy level
customer_reviews.author: Force Recon Marine

customer_reviews.title: GAME CHANGER!!
customer_reviews.text: 66 year old male. I've been on a statin for about a year and a half. I was at my semi annual Dr. appointment, and I was complaining of "muscle, and joint pain. Bad leg cramps. Muscle aches. Non stop. My Dr. put me on Meloxicam (for arthritis. NO change. My brother comes in to town, and when I described my symptoms, he said, "you know about CoQ10, right?" He continued, "Qunol ULTRA 100mg. I began to take one a day, as prescribed, and within several weeks, ALL symptoms gone. ALL. Not sure why MY Dr. didn't tell me about this, so I am. GET it. Read about it. Does more for muscle tissue as we age.....THANKS!
customer_reviews.author: JWG

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money -- Pills all stuck together --
customer_reviews.text: I would never buy this product again. All the pills are stuck together inside the bottle. DO NOT PURCHASE!

customer_reviews.title: It works. How.. I don't care!

customer_reviews.title: All of the softgels in the container were melted
customer_reviews.text: Although I bought these supplements 4 months ago, I didn’t expect to discover that they have melted. When I received the containers (I have purchased 2 containers ), it seemed strange that they didn’t make any noise while shaking them, but I assumed they put something inside to prevent the noise. When I opened the containers a week ago I understood why they didn’t make any noise. It’s not the 1st time I buy supplements from this brand, but it’s the first time I’m getting them in such condition (useless).
customer_reviews.author: Efrat Redlich

customer_reviews.title: Capsules stick together.  Impossible to get out of bottle without damaging capsules.
customer_reviews.text: Although directions were followed regarding capsule storage, the capsules packed tightly together in a way that kept me from removing them from the container. DO NOT PURCHASE.

customer_reviews.title: This product really works!

Called twice, each time the message was to leave a message which was full and not excepting new messages. When I opened the product all the pills were stuck together and would not come apart. Apparently a manufacturing error!

customer_reviews.text: Received the bottle as expected, however, all the softgels are fused together. I’m not sure I should use. I guess the were shipped in a very warm storage area of warehouse or truck. This my second order and I find I’m getting fewer muscle spasms, so I will continue to use, however. Opening the bottle and fining them melted or fused is concerning.

My Dr. ordered an annual blood test and the deep, rich red blood just flowed out real easy, no struggles with needles getting enough blood. The assistant complimented me on my blood (first time that ever happened). I asked why, she said taking COQ10 improves our blood.! Give it a try. There are cheaper brands, but Qunol is a very good brand.

customer_reviews.text: I am a 85 year old male who is very active--golf and yard work almost everyday. My Dr. suggested that I start taking Qunol Ultra CoQ10. I was hesitant at first but relented. After 4 weeks of taking 1 pill a day I have seen great results. My energy level is much higher, less pains and even sleep better. Quite remarkable!!

customer_reviews.title: Been using for years.
customer_reviews.text: At 60, I'm taking a number of prescription meds and vitamin and mineral supplements. This one is a staple in my pill box. Despite being diagnosed with MS 20 years ago I still lead a normal and relatively healthy life.

customer_reviews.title: $30 = $0 = "via On-Line"
customer_reviews.text: All softgels melted. Entire packages leaking. Other products are also effected, (by oil/grease.) I am warned by USPS/MPS/office via note/oral caution, "for Safety Reason". It may effect my MPS privilege at Iraq/Taji/and FOBs. Please double baggage, and be extra careful.

customer_reviews.title: I was really glad to discover this brand
customer_reviews.text: Having tried various brands (and amounts) of CoQ10 that would initially help prevent the aches and pains that statins always end up giving me but eventually stop preventing, I was really glad to discover this brand. It's been working really well and has allowed me to increase my statins dose.

customer_reviews.title: My neurologist recommended this - I sustained a brain injury
customer_reviews.text: My neurologist recommended this - I sustained a brain injury, then a stroke. In the last year, I started having epileptic seizures (just my head turned to one side - I didn't have the "whole body seizures). The neurologist I see is quite well known as a TBI (traumatic brain injury - believe me, these are incredibly hard to find - most neurologists have just a general idea of what it is. In any event, I have been using this product for more than 2 years. The pharmacy doesn't carry it and neither does insurance because they consider it a "vitamin food"
customer_reviews.author: ipka54

customer_reviews.title: Its what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I was having high blood pressure so I researched the ways to bring it down and this was recommended. Its water and fat soluble so its fast absorbing. It hasn't caused me any stomach upset. I'm really glad I found it because I needed it. I became depressed after my husband died and my nutrition is horrible, so this is one step on my way back up. I'm sure I'll be using it long term!
customer_reviews.author: RobinTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended brand
customer_reviews.text: We were advised by our doctor to take CoQ10 for our hearts, and to work against the side effects of Statins. We took cheaper coQ10 available at any large box drug store, but I realized that not all supplements are equal and I did some research from private labs who test supplements. This was a brand recommended. It is a decent price and we get it in two days with Amazon prime, which is much more convenient than going to the store.
customer_reviews.author: clariseb

customer_reviews.title: I hope this product stays
customer_reviews.text: I was getting chest pains from an artery that likes to spasm apparently. It took a long time to figure it out due to I'm only 49 and they couldn't find anything wrong with my heart. I also take a low dose statin. My daughter had read somewhere that statins can build plaque up in your arteries and it was recommended to take coq10 if you took statins. I asked my doctor and she agreed it was worth it. I still get the chest pain once in awhile, but down probably 90% from what it was. The only downfall I've seen is I believe it thins the blood. If I get cut now, I bleed more.

customer_reviews.title: Only The Best Will Do

There are several similar products available at lower prices but similar is not the comparison needed. Similar is not saying "it’s the same". When it comes to my health and my heart only the best will do. QUNOL is the best.!

I tried several brands of CoQ10 and found Qunol works best for me. Easy to swallow gel caps (that don't stick together) and the 120 count is the perfect size - I only need to resupply 4 times a year. Thanks for a great product!

customer_reviews.text: I was taking whatever inexpensive brand I could find after being diagnosed with a heart issue five years ago; Dr's orders. They are just so darn expensive and I have all these supplements and medications I'm taking now. Never felt any difference until I tried this brand. I don't think I'll use another brand again.

customer_reviews.title: Good Bye Pain
customer_reviews.text: My Cardiologist put me on this twice a day for pain in my legs and feet. It really works...I can tell if I miss a dose but still not in as much pain as I was. Qunol CoQ10 has allowed me to continue to do everything I want to, before I could hardly walk in the evening time because putting weight on my legs and feet was extremely painful. Would definitely recommend this to anyone. --- Doctor put me on it to reverse the side effects of Crestor.
customer_reviews.author: NYSS

customer_reviews.title: Another arrow in the quiver
customer_reviews.text: Adding to my heart-healthy diet, increasing exercise and stress reduction, I read some research about Co!Q10 as a supplement that many recommend. I asked my cardiologist and she said go right ahead. From a traditional medical doctor, I take that to mean whatever research she is privy to, she thinks this could help. I wish we had more and better research but women, especially, are left to figure much of our health out on our own. I have recommended this to many and believe it's part of what I can do to improve my heart health.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline A. Church

customer_reviews.title: Stops Leg Cramps!
customer_reviews.text: Found out that this works great if you have leg cramps. My mom had nightly leg cramps for over 40 years - once she started taking Qunol CoQ10 the cramps have nearly stopped! And she tried everything, soap under the sheets, quinine, tonic water, massage, heating pads, etc. Some things gave temporary relief, but this has taken care of nearly all of them. Other brands have not worked as well and the liquid stuff is not good tasting. 8-)
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnna G.

customer_reviews.title: Best CoQ10 I've tried so far...
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this product and don't have any dislikes. I think it's a great value for the price, and I can tell the difference in how I feel when I don't take it. It's easy to swallow, there is no "burps", aftertaste, or upset stomach, or any other side effects I've witnessed. I've tried other brands in the past, but I always came back to and stayed with Qunol. I will definitely buy this again and recommend to anyone!

customer_reviews.title: ... and while my blood pressure isn't where I would like it, it did drop considerably within months after ...

It is always advisable to check with your doctor if anyone can use "natural" aids it is a plus for ones health. Will continue to purchase.

customer_reviews.text: I give the product, and myself, one star. Nowhere in the product details, description or front label does it mention there is vitamin E in the product, something I'm told not to take. You have to look at the back label to see this so I assumed I was just buying 100mg tabs of pure product. Granted it was shown in the manufacturers comments as a picture, but I didn't notice that picture. Now I just shot 23 down the drain.

customer_reviews.text: Just an FYI. This supplement contains 150mg of Vitamin E which is not stated on the product description. I did not realize it and I am not able to take Vitamin E. Amazon was very helpful in the resolution as usual.

customer_reviews.text: Just Got My 6 Month Labs Back And All Was Great. A1C Was 4.7!!!! This Along With My ALA Supplement, Brain Power+ Omega 3 Supplement (That I Can Only Find On Amazon--WHY? I Don't Know), My D3 2000 Units Daily, And My Qunol Tumeric Curciman, Made My Labs Turn Out Much Better Than Expected. In 6 Months Of Eating Better And My Supplements I Also Lost 50 Pounds (All Gut) And 5 Inches From My Waist. DIABETICS, I Pray You Have The Same results Or Better Than Myself. customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: My cardiologist recommends this specific product; following HA in 2013 in which prescribed statins, beta blockers caused severe muscle, joint pain. Statins, beta blockers keep your artery pathways clear as well as diminishes joint space fluid. Qunol supports joint fluid and I can attest to the fact it definitely works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Helps in keeping blood profile numbers in good range
customer_reviews.text: Of course, one cannot say with certainty that any vitamin supplement makes one feel differently; however, Qunol, I believe, along with my husband, to be the best CoQ10 product. We had been using a non-brand version through mail order; but paying for supplements, we wanted to be sure that we were getting the best. That cardiologists endorse this product helps, too. My doctor pulls a "Berkeley" blood profile at every other visit, and my numbers are very good. Of course, there is always one profile, maybe, where I can use a bit more discipline. Supplements are not a panacea, of course. Combined with a healthy diet and exercise, supplements like Qunol provide a very good regimen.
customer_reviews.author: P. Dytrych

customer_reviews.title: Feeling 20 years younger!
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting the results I received from this CO Q10 supplement. I took 1 capsule before bedtime every night, and at first didn't notice any difference in terms of energy. After about 3 weeks though, it kicked in full force. I haven't had this much energy in years. I'm 64 and feel like 44. It's also lifted my mood. I am sold and a Force to be reckoned with! Many thanks to Qunol for offering a superior product.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Take this product and feel better about your health!
customer_reviews.text: I take this product to reduce my cholesterol and to feel better overall. No one ever said that growing old is graceful or painless--quite the opposite! Everyone, protect your health, in the end, it is all that you have!

customer_reviews.title: Pills are enormous
customer_reviews.text: These pills could be a problem for those that have a hard time swallowing pills. They are very long and if they happen to turn sideways on the way down it would be painful. They are soft gel so are easy to swallow for their size.

customer_reviews.title: Feedback

I just lost the 21.00 for a sticky mess of capsules that cannot be torn apart without breaking the gel cap. Waste of money and no customer service from the company.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this after having problems with heart palpitations. I did see a cardiologist and had lots of tests done because of PVC's in an EKG. After tests, the doc said it was nothing serious. It was very annoying though because I could feel what felt like my heart flipping around. It was aggravating and uncomfortable. I lost sleep because of it. I did some research and started taking these. I take 2 a day. I no longer have the issue with my heart flip-flopping in my chest. To me, this was well worth the money spent.

customer_reviews.text: I regret purchasing these supplements. I have never seen such a large capsule! Impossible to swallow without gagging.

customer_reviews.title: So grateful!
customer_reviews.text: Really helped reduce my migraines. I began taking this as a more homeopathic form of controlling my new onset migraines. This seems to have worked wonders. Part of my daily routine now and only one per day.
customer_reviews.author: MellieB

customer_reviews.title: They're too darn big!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any convenient way to tell how much of this gets into my bloodstream, but it would have been so much better if they had asked you to swallow two smaller capsules instead of this giant one. It is over an inch long. Quite difficult to swallow, and I don't think it's healthy to abuse your throat and esophagus like that. I wish I had bought my old brand. Definitely won't buy this again.

customer_reviews.title: I feel Safe with this product
customer_reviews.text: I use this product twice daily. I am taking a statin drug and it has been recommended that I take CoQ-10 to relieve muscle aches. Other products I have used were not effective and in some cases I felt were defective. The pills always showed up as different colors and different within the same bottle. After speaking with the companies, I never received a complete answer as to what color they should be. I like that Qunol has better absorption, I do not need a higher dose, and I take it twice daily so a lower dose works extremely well. I would recommend this product to anyone taking a statin.

customer_reviews.text: Photo on the Amazon site shows it contains Ubiquinone USP grade. What I received is only Coenzyme CoQ10. This also contains a synthetic form of vitamin E. This is not natural vitamin E. The heading on the site states “natural”. False. I don’t give any of my family members dl-alpha tocopheryl. It needs to be d-alpha tocopheryl acetate to be natural.

customer_reviews.text: I used to suffer from severe headaches every night due to chronic fatigue syndrome, which causes brain inflammation but, after taking this for one week the headaches stopped. When I ran out the headaches returned and I reordered Qunol coq10 and a week later the headaches stopped again. I can't be without this. I suggest from fibromyalgia and "myalgic ENCEPHALITIS". Encephalitis means brain inflammation and it would take over my entire left side of my head and face, including left eye, left side of my mouth (my teeth) and the left temporal mandibular jaw. Everything would throb simultaneously. It was excruciating. I love this product.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the new container as I finished the old bottle. Opened up and all the pills are stuck together and will not come apart. Do not buy!!! Pissed off and disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't get the softgels out of the bottle - they were ALL stuck together
customer_reviews.text: I love Qunol CoQ10 however this shipment was a total loss. ALL of the softgels - both bottles - were stuck together and I could not separate them. This item wasn't eligible for return either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I haven't been using it for very long however it ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been using it for very long however it seems to be making me feel stronger. Everything came as expected on time and all, I will continue using this product for my health for I have had four bypasses. Bill
customer_reviews.author: Billy E. Brown

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful suppliment!
customer_reviews.text: November 2017 I was severly poisoned. I projectile vomited and my aortic valve tore in 4 places. After emergency surgery at Audie Murphy VA Hospital in San Antonio, Texas, a three week stay at ICU, and a week at another recovery facility, I was sent home, weak as a puppy. I have been on Qunol Ultra CoQ10 ever since and I feel as strong as a horse. This is a wonderful product. God bless you!
customer_reviews.author: Mensa

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking Qunol for 3+:years now. When I was out on a statin, I new that it would be depleting things out of my body that I need. I don't have issues like cramps,muscle weakness, or real fatigue that are side effects of statins. I truly believe this product has aided in me not having such issues. I don't have anything bad to say about it. I will continue to take this product as long as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Southern girl

customer_reviews.title: 2 Wks ago 1 Bottle was fine & I just opened the 2nd one today & is 1 big glob cannot get 1 pill out?
customer_reviews.text: I can not use any of this bottle I want to return it to the sender? Expiration is 02-2024 I need to return this unuseable product. Please email or call with information. kkursch@gmail.com Pauline Kursch 678-394-4045

customer_reviews.title: Allows me to take Crestor without muscle pain
customer_reviews.text: Allows me to take Crestor without muscle pain. Most Cholesterol lowering drugs used to give me terrible muscle pain in my hands and shoulders. Talking this completely eliminates this side effect.

customer_reviews.title: Pills stuck together
customer_reviews.text: I order these all the time, however this time the pills were all stuck together. When I try to pull them apart, they open up.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Will never be without this product. I have C.O.P.D. and congestive heart failure. This product delays my shortness of breath and helps me recover from exhaustion, when it does occur. Qunol coq10 is the best that I've tried. Will not be looking any further. Update, I've purchased this item six times now with no problems. This last order came to me, well within the expiration date, slightly melted. soft and all stuck together. May find a different vendor next time..
customer_reviews.author: David Ford

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is one of the tools in my bag of supplements that has improved my heart health. After my heart attack, my Cardiologist is very pleased as my test results as I never miss a day in taking this supplement!
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in a massive clump
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived with all the pills REALLY stuck together. I tried to return/exchange but it says, of all the items I purchased, that this item cannot be returned! According to the packing slip, it was fulfilled by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen O

customer_reviews.title: It's good for me.
customer_reviews.text: I take one of these daily. I have remained heart disease free. My Father was a man who had his first major heart attack at 44. I am 66 and my heart never fails me. I told my Doctor about this, and she said that it is wonderful that I take it, and to keep on doing that. I have now subscribed to having it automatically shipped to me every other month at Amazon.com.
customer_reviews.author: Frustrated in Indiana

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: My doctor put me on statin and it was causing cramps in my feet so bad. I started taking this Qunol CoQ10. I know about CoQ for years but never took it. My cramps stopped! No more waking in the middle of the night. That was a few years back and I eventually stopped with the statin but continued taking Qunol. A while back I ran out and didn't replace it. My cramps started again, every night. Now I won't go without it and take it everyday. In fact I have 4 more backup bottles so I don't run out. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Capsules Melted Into A LUMP
customer_reviews.text: This item was in a box. I brought it inside when the doorbell rang for delivery. Capsules are entirely melted into a lump! No way to separate them. Buy these somewhere else or not at all!

customer_reviews.title: Does What I Need It For
customer_reviews.text: My doctor suggested adding CoQ10 to ease muscle cramps from my statin meds. I didn't believe it would really work but I'm glad I decided to give it a try. He didn't suggest a brand but I found this one in Walgreen's, then found it for less on Amazon. NO MORE MUSCLE CRAMPS!!!
customer_reviews.author: jagjean

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended that I take CoQ10 when I was prescribed atorvastatin for cholesterol. She said it would prevent the muscle cramps associated with that drug. I was leery because I have really bad reflux. I tried one from the local drugstore and it did repeat on me so I did some research and found Qunol CoQ10. No reflux issues and no side effects from my prescription. Win-win!

customer_reviews.text: This has a good amount of vitamin e. My cardiologist said that heart patients should avoid vitamin e supplements. I would really love to return this because I can't take it but it is not eligible for return. I am very unhappy with my purchase

customer_reviews.text: This one is a waste of money since it doesn't have the "Q + Kaneka" trademarked logo anywhere on it, meaning the process hasn't made the contents of this supplement bioavailable. It didn't work. I got a different one from the same brand that did have the logo on the back (it's sort of a bronze/ goldish color background instead of the dark black bkg on this) and it began working instantly.

customer_reviews.text: Within 20 minutes of taking this I lose all energy and motivation and just want to take a nap. Not good for someone who is trying to increase their activity.

customer_reviews.text: This is a purer CoQ10. Seen it advertised elsewhere and it was expensive. Good price on Amazon and I have more energy throughout my 48 hour day

customer_reviews.text: I use a statin for high cholesterol, My doctor recommended that I also take COQ10

customer_reviews.title: Qunol Softgels were all melted together
customer_reviews.text: The product is good otherwise I would not be re purchasing it. However, I purchased my Qunol Ultra CoQ10 July 31. I opened the bottle Sept 20th. I still had other bottles. When I opened it they softgels were very glued together. Shaking was not going to do it. I tried separating them but only punctured one which created a mess. I paid about thirty dollars for this bottle. Very upset. Return was only 30days after purchase. Texas is hot in August, I am sure the pills were already melted with one another when I recieved it. Very upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Making a healthy change
customer_reviews.text: I will keep ordering: no smell. Just take it with a meal. This October I get another blood check up so I will let you know if I see my bad chol go down.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Bitela

customer_reviews.title: Item is DEFECTIVE, purchased April 2019, expiration date 01/2022.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered item in April 2019, expiration of product 01/2022. Opened it today with cover seal still in place and peel off gasket seal still on bottle. Pills are clustered and stuck together totally and cannot be SEPARATED. Seems like some kind of vacuum happened and all of the pills are concentrated together with some shrinkage shown. Can I get a replacement bottle, willing to ship bottle back for INSPECTION by manufacturer. "BUYER BE WARE! DID NOT RECEIVE REPLY NOR INQUIRY FROM MANUFACTURER even if product return is 30 days, how can the product be defective (12/1/19) now) way before the EXPIRATION DATE!!!
customer_reviews.author: MILTON

customer_reviews.title: Quality for Ingredients
customer_reviews.text: A few years ago, our doctor recommended CoQ10 for my husband and me. We tried several brands but found that the Qunol brand was the best value for the quality of ingredients. We haven't tried any others since.
customer_reviews.author: DC from WI

customer_reviews.title: Difference Noticed
customer_reviews.text: I had been taking another brand with the same dosage of CoQ10 & decided to try this one that said it was 3 X more absorbable. Within 3 days, I noticed I felt more energy & an overall good feeling. I rarely do a review, but with this product, I did notice a difference very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Sue D

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best CoQ10
customer_reviews.text: It's this simple---Qunol Ultra CoQ10 is simply the best CoQ10 on the market. My cardiologist heartily (no pun intended) recommended Qunol CoQ10 when she first started me taking a CoQ10 supplement several years ago. While a bit more expensive than some other manufacturer's CoQ10, you do get what you pay for because my test results showed my body absorbs Qunol CoQ10 better than others that are on the market---and the whole goal behind taking it is to have your body absorb it! Therefore, there's no CoQ10 that I trust more than Qunol Ultra CoQ10.
customer_reviews.author: D. Allie

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT VITAMIN!
customer_reviews.text: DOCTOR RECOMMENDED! My wife is a doctor and she is a big supporter of vitamins. She recommended I start taking this brand and type of vitamin since I started taking Metphormin for my diabetes. The pill is a little large but it goes down smoothly. There is no after taste at all. My family doctor keeps giving me positive comments on my testing results and I love to hear that. It gives me additional incentive to push for better health. I definitely recommend Qunol Ultra CoQ10 to family and friends!
customer_reviews.author: cortezed

product_meta.title: Qunol Ultra CoQ10 100mg, 3x Better Absorption, Patented Water and Fat Soluble Natural Supplement Form of Coenzyme Q10, Antioxidant for Heart Health, 120 Count Softgels
product_meta.description: Size:120 Count (Pack of 1)| Style:SoftgelsQunol Ultra 100mg CoQ10, 3x Better Absorption, Patented Water and Fat Soluble Natural Supplement Form of Coenzyme Q10, Antioxidant for Heart Health, 120 Count Soft gels. Directions - adults take one (1) softgel per day with food, or as recommended by your healthcare professional. Keep bottle tightly closed in a cool and dry place (59 - 86 degree fahrenheit / 15 - 30 degree celsius ) and DO NOT REFRIGERATE. Ubiquinol is the active form of CoQ10 and is used in the production of cellular energy
feature_bullets: 3X BETTER ABSORPTION THAN REGULAR [2] CoQ10 — Clinical trials have proven that no other CoQ10 supplement absorbs better than Qunol. In fact, Qunol Ultra absorbs 3X better than regular [2] CoQ10.

#1 CARDIOLOGIST RECOMMENDED FORM OF COQ10* — With superior absorption compared to regular [2] CoQ10, Qunol 100mg CoQ10 softgel capsules can help you reach optimal levels of Coenzyme Q10 sooner, so you can experience the potential benefits faster.
100% WATER AND FAT-SOLUBLE — Qunol CoQ10’s patented formulation is 100% water and fat-soluble, unlike regular [2] CoQ10 that does not dissolve in water and dissolves very poorly in fat.

BENEFICIAL TO STATIN DRUG USERS — Statin medications have been shown to lower CoQ10 levels by as much as 40% [3] and the addition of a CoQ10 supplement to statin drug therapy can help rebuild CoQ10 levels.

ESSENTIAL FOR ENERGY PRODUCTION — CoQ10 plays a vital role in the production of energy in the body. Taking a CoQ10 supplement helps increase natural CoQ10 levels that can be depleted by age and cholesterol-lowering statin medications [4].
